import * as React from 'react' import './fnt_sze.css' let color_a:string,color_b:string,color_c:string,color_d:string; let StoredFntSze:any = localStorage.getItem('LocalFntSze') export default function Font(props:any){ const [Fntsze, SetFntsze] = React.useState(StoredFntSze) React.useEffect(()=>{props.fntSlct(Fntsze);}) alert(StoredFntSze) const fntSze_a=()=>{ SetFntsze(20) localStorage.setItem('localFntSze','20') } const fntSze_b=()=>{ SetFntsze(22) localStorage.setItem('localFntSze','22') } const fntSze_c=()=>{ SetFntsze(24) localStorage.setItem('localFntSze','24') } const fntSze_d=()=>{ SetFntsze(26) localStorage.setItem('localFntSze','26') } switch(Fntsze){ case 20: color_a='red' color_b='' color_c='' color_d='' break; case 22: color_a='' color_b='red' color_c='' color_d='' break; case 24: color_a='' color_b='' color_c='red' color_d='' break; case 26: color_a='' color_b='' color_c='' color_d='red' break; } return (
) }
